tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE luxury_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(100),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bedrooms INT,
    bathrooms INT,
    size_sqft INT,
    amenities JSON,
    features JSON
)

CREATE TABLE luxury_properties (property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL, description TEXT, amenities TEXT[], features TEXT[])

CREATE TABLE property_photos (photo_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, property_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES luxury_properties(property_id), photo_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, caption VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (photo_id, property_id) )

CREATE TABLE property_reviews (review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, property_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES luxury_properties(property_id), reviewer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, rating INT NOT NULL, review_text TEXT, review_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE luxury_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE property_amenities (
    property_id INT,
    amenity_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (property_id, amenity_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES luxury_properties(property_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (amenity_id) REFERENCES amenities(amenity_id)
);
